EmailTemplate.name: 25/06/2014 KS1 Prize Giving
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to KS1 Prize Giving
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
You are invited to attend BSKL's Key Stage 1 Prize Giving on Thursday, 10th July 2014 at 10am at the Secondary Theatre. Our guest speaker is Mr Giles Duley, an award-winning war photojournalist. Canap√©s will be served between 11am and 11:45am by the pool side.
Please RSVP by 27th June 2014 via the online form in the link below.
Online RSVP form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1AV1O20aqrezYM2aYA11zOlbOpa7F_AItUpqP84cnGyc/viewform)
Invitation to KS1 Prize Giving (https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xcVpURzRkN1NHWnc/edit?usp=sharing)
Kind regards,
Admin Team British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
